quote: Imagine if every time someone comes in for an open house, that lead automatically goes into your CRM and gets a follow-up email.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a specific, actionable use case for technology integration.
suggested_hook: Tired of manual data entry? Here's how to automate your open house leads.

quote: It's so difficult to integrate all my different apps... I cannot tell you the sheer amount of hours I've put into it.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the common frustration with tech integration and the relief Real Sync provides.
suggested_hook: Struggling with tech integration? You're not alone.
